Title: Authorizes SUNY and CUNY to provide emergency aid grants to certain students
Summary: Authorizes SUNY and CUNY to provide emergency aid grants to certain students; provides that the state shall reimburse half of all such grants provided; requires the higher education services corporation to provide an annual report on such programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing an emergency aid grant program to allow the state university of New York or the city university of New York to provide emergency aid grants to certain students
